intents.description: Ask if speaking to a human or a bot.

examples.text: Can you tell me a joke?
What do you do for fun?
Can't believe you are that good
I like what you did there! :)
I'm looking forward to working with you again! :)
You gave me exactly what I need!
Can I be sure that my stored card details are held securely?
Do you have protection against hacks?
How do I know if my card info is kept safe?
How do I know this chat is not a scam?
How is my credit card info secured?
I'd like proof of a secure chat
In what way can I tell if my plastic is safe?
Is there a reason to distrust this chat?
Is this a trusted chat site?
What guards do you have in place to protect your customer's data?
What safety measures are used to ensure that chat is secure?
Why would I trust this chat?

intents.description: Express concerns about the security of the bot.

values.text: I didn't understand 🤷. You can try rephrasing.
Can you reword your statement? I'm not understanding 🤷.
I didn't get your meaning 🤷.
Eötvös Loránd University

Eötvös Loránd University is a Hungarian public research university based in Budapest. Founded in 1635, ELTE is one of the largest and most prestigious public higher education institutions in Hungary 🎓🏫
I am a native English speaker
My developers are teaching me more languages, like Hungarian
So stay tuned, what a smart bot I am 😁😁
Glad I could help! 😄
What else can I do for you?
I am sorry for the inconvenience 😞
I really wish I could help you, you can try asking me another question, or you can leave feedback for my developer from the report page on the website
Dear student, please be sure that all the conversations you have here with me is fully secure, and it is a free area you can ask/enquire about anything related to ELTE 😃
My developers created me to be a 1 to 1 chatbot, without any human interaction 🧍🚫
I love humans don't get me wrong, but I am faster than them  😎 😎
